New Records: James Harden moved into the No. 2 spot on the career threes list ahead of Ray Allen in the Los Angeles Clippers' 116-105 win over the Utah Jazz.
Post-Match Reflections: James Harden reflected on his achievement and acknowledged the influence of Kevin Durant and Russell Westbrook on his career.
Harden admitted that he probably won't catch Stephen Curry's all-time three-point record, praising Curry's shooting ability.
